page.title: 07Games played at school yard.
page.content: {GAME OF TAG. }You start off running around the playground.The child that is on it,has to try and tag another child that is running around.If they do tag you,you are then on it. { { { {GAME OF SCARECROW. }Two chidren that are on it count upto ten seconds. The other children are running about the playground.The children that are on it have to try and tag them.If they have been tagged,they put their legs or arms up.The children that are running around have to try and free them by running under their arms or legs.
